name: Burgopak
tagline: Graphic Designer in London, United Kingdom
description:
Burgopak is a packaging design company providing a full creative service. From concept to production to delivery, we provide structural and graphic design, artwork services and dedicated project management.
Multi award-winning, Burgopak works with a variety of products and markets, including SIM and gift cards, CD/DVDs, mobile phones, USBs, electronics, chocolate, confectionary, cosmetics and pharmaceuticals.
